email.title: What's your email address?
email.hintText1: We'll use your email address to confirm we've received your submission. We will not publish your email address.

hasInterestedPartyNumber.title1: Do you have an interested party reference number?
hasInterestedPartyNumber.paragraph1: This is a unique reference number that identifies you as an interested party. You will have been given this number when you registered.
hasInterestedPartyNumber.errorMessage1: Select yes if you have an interested party reference number

common.title1: Have your say on an application

deadlinesOpen.phrase1: Use this service to have your say about the
deadlinesOpen.paragraph1: We'll ask for your personal details and your examination comments about this project.
deadlinesOpen.paragraph2: If you're an individual and have registered as an interested party
deadlinesOpen.listItem3: documents to support your comments if you plan to upload them
deadlinesOpen.paragraph4: If you have not registered as an interested party, we'll ask you for your personal details and documents to support your comments if you plan to upload them.
deadlinesOpen.paragraph5: If you're submitting comments as an organisation you work for
deadlinesOpen.listItem7: supporting documents if you plan to upload your documents

noOpenDeadlines.title1: No Deadlines - Have your say on an application
noOpenDeadlines.paragraph1: You cannot submit anything as there are no open deadlines.

agent.title: What's the full name of the person, household or organisation?
agent.heading1: What's the full name of the person, household or organisation?
agent.errorMessage1: Enter the full name of the person, household or organisation
agent.errorMessage2: The full name of the person, household or organisation organisation's name must be between 1 and 255 characters

myself.title: What is your full name?
myself.errorMessage2: Full name must be between 3 and 64 characters

organisation.title: What's your organisation's name?
organisation.errorMessage2: Your organisation's name must be between 1 and 255 characters

submittingFor.title1: Who are you making the submission for?

options.agent: On behalf of another person, a household or another organisation I do not work for

submittingFor.hintText1: If you've not registered as an interested party you can still submit comments, but we may not accept them.
submittingFor.errorMessage1: Select who you are submitting for

yourInterestedPartyNumber.pageTitle1: What's your interested party reference number?
yourInterestedPartyNumber.errorMessage2: Your interested party number must be between 3 and 20 characters
